title: [Predictive Analytics In Child Welfare: An Assessment Of Current Efforts, Challenges And Opportunities](https://aspe.hhs.gov/pdf-report/predictive-analytics-child-welfare-assessment-current-efforts-challenges-and-opportunities)
description_1: This document explores the state of the use of predictive analytics in child welfare by conducting an environmental scan of child welfare agencies, academia, nonprofit organizations, and for-profit vendors.

title: [The United States of Seasons](https://livefreeordichotomize.com/2018/02/12/the-united-states-of-seasons/)
description_1: GIS analysis of weather data to find the most 'seasonal' locations in United States
description_2: Used Bayesian regression methods for smoothing sparse geospatial data.

title: [A year as told by fitbit](https://livefreeordichotomize.com/2017/12/27/a-year-as-told-by-fitbit/)

description_2: Demonstrated visualization-based inference for large data.

title: [MCMC and the case of the spilled seeds](https://livefreeordichotomize.com/2017/10/14/mcmc-and-the-case-of-the-spilled-seeds/)

title: [The Traveling Metallurgist](https://livefreeordichotomize.com/2017/09/25/the-traveling-metallurgist/)
description_1: Pure javascript implementation of traveling salesman solution using simulated annealing.
description_2: Allows reader to customize the number and location of cities to attempt to trick the algorithm.
